title: A MAJOR NEEDED CHANGE TO RANK LOBBY RIOT PLEASE READ.
body:
The ability to report a player for trolling in lobby, 3 reports kicks the player from the lobby and gives a 15min penalty from joining another que.
Allowing the people playing properly to find another person to play with.

it's a joke to get forced into a lobby because you can't dodge and these types of people should be penalized. 
1st offence - 15min penalty
2nd offence - 45mins
3rd Offence - 3 hours, and report made to the tribunal 
4th offence - 2 week ban

During a 24 hour period.
5 offences over a week = 2 week ban.

Everytime a person is kicked the entire lobby convo as well as champion picks, giving the ability for the player to fight the penatly incase of false kicks.
False kicking players brings a block to the feature as well as a penalty of no ip gain and muted chat for a week.

my reason behind this is to clear up the lobbys of all these trolls who plan to feed to take a lane that's already been taken.
